verses.verse: We are making the generosity of God known to you, brothers, the generosity that has been given among the assemblies of Macedonia
because in much experience of hard times the overflow of their happiness and their deep down poverty overflowed into the wealth of their dedication.
I am a witness that according to ability and above ability, on their own,
with much encouragement pleading of us for us to accept the generosity and the sharing of the serving, the serving for the sacred people,
and unlike what we anticipated, but they first gave themselves to the Master and to us through what God wanted
for the "for us to encourage Titus" part, so that just as he already began in on it, so also might he finish up for you even this generosity.
But even as in everything you overflow (with trust, the message, the information, every concern, and the love from you in us), it is so that you may also overflow in this generosity.
I am not saying this in line with a directive, but through the concern of different people and proving the real existence of your love.
You see, you know the generosity of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King, that because of you He (being rich) became poor so that with the poverty of that Person you might become rich.
And I am giving an opinion in this. You see, this is advantageous to you, some who already began in on it since last year, not just the "to do" part, but also the "to be wanting" part.
But right now, also finish up the "to do" part, in order that, exactly as there is the eagerness of the "to be wanting" part, so also is the "to finish up" part from the "to be having" part.
You see, if the eagerness already lies there, "according to whatever someone has" is well-received, not "according to what he doesn't have;"
for it is not that relief is for others, hard times are for you, but out of equality in the present time, your excess is for the deficiency of those people
so that also the excess of those people might become for your deficiency, in order that equality might happen.
This is just as it has been written, (in Exodus 16:18) "The person who gathered the big amount didn't get more than two liters, and the person who gathered the little amount didn't get less."
Generosity be to God, the One who gives the same concern on your behalf in Titus' heart
because he certainly accepted the encouragement, but being more aggressive, he went out to you on his own.
We sent the brother together with him whose high praise is in the good news through all of the assemblies,

not only that, but who was also elected by the assemblies to be our traveling companion together with this generosity, the generosity that is served by us toward the magnificence of his Master and our eagerness.
As we are setting this up, no one should blame us in this abundance, the abundance served by us.
We plan for nice things, not only in the sight of the Master, but also in the sight of people.
Together with them we sent our brother whom we proved in many ways many times that he is aggressive, but right now he is much more aggressive with much confidence for you.
Whether it is my partner and co-worker for you on behalf of Titus or it is our brothers (missionaries of assemblies), it is the Anointed King's magnificence.
So display to them the display of your love and of our bragging on your behalf even to the face of the assemblies.
